name: Escape The Robots And Oh Gosh They're Coming Run
name_original: Escape The Robots And Oh Gosh They're Coming Run
description:
Escape The Robots And Oh Gosh They're Coming Run is an isometric "escape the room" style game made for my Computer Science class. It is currently in beta stages. It isn't polished or fun to play whatsoever, but I will be fixing this later.

This is the result of a team of 6 working for a week and procrastinating for 2 months.
